items.title: CNC Setup — Haas VF-2
steps: Verify work order and drawing revision.
Complete pre-use inspection (guards, E-stop, coolant levels).
Load program and dry-run with single-block.
Set tool offsets and work coordinate.

items.title: CNC Lockout/Tagout (LOTO)
steps: Shut down machine using normal controls.
Release stored energy and verify zero energy state.

items.title: Injection Molding Setup — Arburg 470 C
steps: Pre-heat mold; check clamp force settings.
Purge barrel; verify temperatures and pressures.
Dry run; check guarding and interlocks.
